REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0886 reute d f BC-PRICE-<PCLB>-TO-BUY-8 03-12 0050

TEXT.TITLE: PRICE <PCLB> TO BUY 80 PCT OF TSS-SEEDMAN
TEXT.BODY: Price Co said it agreed to buy at least 81 pct of the stock of <TSS-Seedman's INc> for about 50 mln dlrs. The terms envision a purchase of the entire company, it said. The transaction is expected to close at the end of April. Reuter
